subject: Re: Inform the planet!?
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
What happend to guy spouting all the new age-crystal skulls-spirit stuff? Is it decernment, or denial? When you look at the weather, the earthquakes, the actions of humanity--getting dumber and dumber by the day, the active debunking going on, the lack of news coverage for comets--it begins to look like something is going on. I don't buy the Jesus stuff either, but that doesn't negate the facts.

 As far other planets in the solar system, I think "science" has it all wrong, I think most are habitable in some form. I got voices saying they came from the sixth planet, presumably in this system, and once again I have ask, how would anyone else "know better"? I don't believe constant and daily Earthquakes are the norm, or they wouldn't be mentioned in the bible as a sign of the times. I think this planet is severely fractured, and very little holding it together. 
 What happens when you don't keep moving parts lubricated--as in pulling out all the natural oil of the planet? I think we are living on a future asteroid belt as it ceases up and flies apart. Yet again, how would anyone "know better"? With only a slight amount of research, anyone can punch holes in every "scientific" theory all day long. Some dweeb in a university has a thought and it becomes gospel. Some duffus does a "thought experiment" and it's irrefutable--how the f--- does that work!? You think it, therefore it is by virture of titles and degree?  If you don't have titles and degrees, anything you think of is nonsensical. 

 yeah, rambling of a lunatickingnutcase.

F-S
